original: Lundegard, Bengt, direktör, Göteborg, f. 3/6/90 i Målilla, Kalmar 1., av A. W. L. o. Evelina Svens’Son. G. 18 m. Kristina Muren. Barn: Bengt f. 19, kamrer, res :löjtn., Britta 20, g. m. kamrer George Frimann-Clausen, Karin 22, postexp., Ingrid 23, farm. kand., g. m. farm. kand. Göran Mårtensson, Sven 25, g. m. Britt Johnson. — Lä-rov:stud. Res. t. Engl. o. kontinenten. Anst. å kont. 07-14, avd:ch. o. dir. h. Ekström & Lefflers A-B i Gbg 14-38, v. verkst. dir. i A-B Eol där 38-40, verkst. dir. i A-B Sv. kolonial-gros’sister i Gbg sed. 40, i Förlags A-B ASK sed. 42, i A-B Sv. konsument-ekonomi sed. 43 samt i United Nordic Importers A-B o. Kvarn A-B Ö;ster-gyllen sed. 44. Styr:led. i dessa företag samt i A-B Sukab, Mjölby Kvarn A-B, Sv. koionialvaruimp :fören., Imp:fören. f. färsk frukt, Slakt-varuimp :fören.. Sv. isill- o. fiskimp :-fören.. Sv. kolonialvaruengr. fiksförb. m. fl. Ansv. utg. av tidn. Fri Köpenskap. Hobbies: jakt, fiske, böcker, bokbinderi.
translated: Lundegard, Bengt, director, Gothenburg, born 3/6/90 in Målilla, Kalmar County, son of A. W. L. and Evelina Svens'Son. Married 18 with Kristina Muren. Children: Bengt born 19, accountant, reserve lieutenant, Britta 20, married to accountant George Frimann-Clausen, Karin 22, postal clerk, Ingrid 23, pharmacy graduate, married to pharmacy graduate Göran Mårtensson, Sven 25, married to Britt Johnson. Educational background: studied at upper secondary level. Traveled to England and the continent. Employed at a company from 1907 to 1914, department chief and director at Ekström & Lefflers A-B in Gothenburg from 1914 to 1938, executive director at A-B Eol from 1938 to 1940, executive director at A-B Swedish Colonial Wholesalers in Gothenburg since 1940, at AB ASK since 1942, at A-B Swedish Consumer Economy since 1943, and at United Nordic Importers A-B and Kvarn A-B Öster-Gyllen since 1944. Board member in these companies as well as in A-B Sukab, Mjölby Kvarn A-B, Swedish Colonial Goods Import Association, Import Association for Fresh Fruits, Swedish Ice and Fish Import Association, Swedish Colonial Products Engineering Firms, etc. Responsible for editing the magazine "Fri Köpenskap". Hobbies include hunting, fishing, books, and bookbinding.

memberOf.name: Swedish Ice and Fish Import Association
